airfogsim.airfogsim_env module¶

class airfogsim.airfogsim_env.AirFogSimEnv¶

Bases: object

AirFogSimEnv is the main class for the airfogsim environment. It provides the simulation of communication, computation, storage, battery, vehicle/UAV trajectory, cloud/cloudlet nodes, AI models for entities, blockchain, authentication, and privacy. It also provides the APIs for the agent to interact with the environment. The agent can be a DRL agent, a rule-based agent, or a human player.

getCloudServerById(id)¶

Check whether the environment is done.

Returns:

The done signal. True if the episode is done, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

step()¶

The step function of the environment. It simulates the environment for one time step.

Returns:

The done signal. True if the episode is done, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

airfogsim.airfogsim_scheduler module¶

class airfogsim.airfogsim_scheduler.AirFogSimScheduler¶

Bases: object

The scheduler for AirFogSimEnv. It provides communication, computation, task generation, blockchain scheduler. Agent interacts with this class to get the state, reward, and done signal.

static addMethodsFromSchedulers()¶

Add the methods from all scheduler classes to AirFogSimScheduler. By using this method, the agent can call the methods from all scheduler classes by calling the methods from AirFogSimScheduler.

Examples

AirFogSimScheduler.addMethodsFromSchedulers() compSched = AirFogSimScheduler.getComputationScheduler() compSched.setComputationModel(env, ‘M/M/1’) AirFogSimScheduler.setComputationModel(env, ‘M/M/1’)

static getBlockchainScheduler()¶

Get the blockchain scheduler for the environment. It schedules the blockchain tasks for the blockchain nodes.

Returns:

The blockchain scheduler.

Return type:

BlockchainScheduler

static getCommunicationScheduler()¶

Get the communication scheduler for the environment. It schedules the communication tasks for the fog nodes.

Returns:

The communication scheduler.

Return type:

CommunicationScheduler

static getComputationScheduler()¶

Get the computation scheduler for the environment. It schedules the computation tasks for the fog nodes.

Returns:

The computation scheduler.

Return type:

ComputationScheduler

static getRewardScheduler()¶

Get the reward scheduler for the environment. It calculates the reward for the agent.

Returns:

The reward scheduler.

Return type:

RewardScheduler

static getSchedulerMethodList()¶

Get the list of all scheduler methods. Use inspect module to get the list of all static methods in this class. The method name should start with ‘get’ and end with ‘Scheduler’.

Returns:

The list of all scheduler method names.

Return type:

list

static getTaskScheduler()¶

Get the task scheduler for the environment. It schedules the tasks for the task nodes.

Returns:

The task scheduler.

Return type:

airfogsim.airfogsim_wrapper module¶

class airfogsim.airfogsim_wrapper.AirFogSimEnvWrapper(env, config)¶

Bases: object

Visual wrapper for the environment. This wrapper will render the environment and provide the visual feedback to the agent.
